text.description:
ðŸ‡µðŸ‡¹ Piri Piri Chicken Tour: https://youtu.be/Vtp1pZg0FZ0 ðŸŒ¶ Ghost Chili: https://amzn.to/3PNTvNQ ðŸ‘• T-shirts: https://store.migrationology.com/
PORTO, PORTUGAL - Porto is one of the sandwich capitals of the world and today weâ€™re going on an ultimate Portuguese street food sandwich tour to show you some of the best sandwiches in the city!
Huge thank you to Taste Porto (https://tasteporto.com/) for taking me on this incredible tour - they are the best! Thank you AndrÃ© ApolinÃ¡rio and Ricardo Brochado, it was amazing to hang out with them. Check them out for incredible food tours in Porto.
Hereâ€™s everything we ate on this Porto food tour:
Casa dos Presuntos â€œXicoâ€ (https://maps.app.goo.gl/s8FzyXEkCbG9dSrD7) - This place is famous for their Presunto - a Portuguese dry cured ham, and their SalpicÃ£o - Smoked sausage with wine and paprika, which was fantastic.
O Astro (https://maps.app.goo.gl/Wt9YkkMvTFr6Ku656) - Legendary family run restaurant known for their Bifana - a classic Portuguese pork sandwich, where the pork is thin sliced and poached in their special chili laced oil and seasoning.
Cervejaria Gazela (https://maps.app.goo.gl/mRHkeocdLXX8xXsR9) - The Cachorrinho is sometimes referred to as the Portuguese hot dog, but itâ€™s much different - it includes bread with butter layered in sausage, hot dog, and cheese and then griddle fried and then brushed with more butter and drizzed in piri piri oil. Itâ€™s something truly amazing!
Casa Guedes Tradicional (https://maps.app.goo.gl/hMp8VVUD135Pavqt7) - Continuing on this Portuguese street food tour we stopped at yet another legendary sandwich spot to try their melt in your mouth Sandes de Pernil - Roasted pork sandwich.
Casa Expresso (https://maps.app.goo.gl/tDFFKwKrhdL6AjFVA) - We then headed to RojÃ£o for their famous braised pork sandwich!
O Golfinho (https://maps.app.goo.gl/AfJqMWvBopt3YoJ2A) - Finally on this tour we tried the king of all Portuguese sandwiches - The Francesinha - which is a massive sandwich filled with meat, cheese, and drenched in a secret sauce. If thatâ€™s not enough, you pour fries into the gravy - itâ€™s one of the worldâ€™s greatest sandwiches!
Thank you again to AndrÃ© and Ricardo from Taste Porto (https://tasteporto.com/)!
Social Media: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/markwiensfoodvideos Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/migrationology/ Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@markwiens
ðŸ‘• T-shirts: https://store.migrationology.com/ ðŸŒ¶ Ghost Chili: https://amzn.to/3PNTvNQ ðŸŽ¥ Camera gear I use: https://amzn.to/3FVdBUd (some of these are Amazon affiliate links)
